website_summaries.verdict: Even though this wristlet is priced extremely low, it still carries the great Coach brand name and the quality they are known for.
pros: This beautiful wristlet is the perfect size and not bulky, even though it can carry credit cards, money, and an older iPhone
cons: Even though it's a very low price for Coach, there are many other similar wristlets priced even lower

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Wanted it for a little makeup kit because I found them all over in my purse. Purse and card wallet are a set and the wristlet and wallet match it well.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Tull

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size wristlet!
customer_reviews.text: Just received today and I love it. It is exactly as pictured. It fits my credit cards, money and Iphone 6S snugly (i have a very slender case on my phone) but this would not be big enough for the 6 Plus. Comes with Coach tags and a Coach gift box in case you wish to give as a gift.I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: JadeBratz

customer_reviews.title: I should have known better. Wasn't worth the fee
customer_reviews.text: $325.00 Coach wristlet for $38.00, I should have known better. Wasn't worth the fee. Can't hold anything. Very disappointed. Very deceiving add.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: COACH F58035 Corner Zip Wristlet
customer_reviews.text: Great little wristlet when you don't want to carry a heavy, bulky purse. Would like it more if it were square shaped. It is probably fake Coach due to quality of the leather. However, it looks good enough to keep.
customer_reviews.author: Sassy

customer_reviews.title: Stay Woke
customer_reviews.text: Very cute my iPhone fits no problem great for shopping I had carrying my purse in store. Because SWB (shopping while black) is real! Stay Woke
customer_reviews.author: c werts

customer_reviews.title: Nice and pretty.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time. They are original, they have a good size for cards and cash, especially when you don’t want to carry a big bag! Coach is always nice!
customer_reviews.author: Gabriela V.

customer_reviews.title: Coach Wristlet
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice wristlet wallet, it is for a gift so can’t say more. However, it arrived quickly and was packaged very nicely in a Coach box and tissue. I think the receiver will love it.
customer_reviews.author: C. Schaefer

customer_reviews.title: Stamped leather lasts longer than the strap attached to it.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one. I love them as wallets. It holds just what I need and when I'm in a hurry, it is easy to tie around my wrist and just take with me instead of a purse. I love my coach wristlet.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Boyles

customer_reviews.title: Real coach
customer_reviews.text: It's small but it's good quality real coach I'm using it to carry three or 4 beauty products.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Coach wallet
customer_reviews.text: Love my wallet. I have wanted one for years and finally decided to splurge although the price was very nice.
customer_reviews.author: scott Barton

customer_reviews.title: Real doesn’t always mean expensive
customer_reviews.text: I love this wristlet!!!! It’s a traditional look that gives you the fashion status you want without the expensive price tag.
customer_reviews.author: DeMae Brown

customer_reviews.title: Fake!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This item is not aunthentic. No YKK zipper cheaply made. No Coach imprint on the inside of wristlet. Angered and annoyed.
customer_reviews.author: Nalini

customer_reviews.title: Cute but is it authentic?
customer_reviews.text: Thought it would be bigger to fit my check book buy its a little bigger than a coin purse. But it can work for cocktail party.
customer_reviews.author: Nikisha

customer_reviews.title: Perfect compliment
customer_reviews.text: Perfect compliment to the purse i purchased for my wife for Christmas
customer_reviews.author: luis t delgado

customer_reviews.title: The product look like a knock-off in person.
customer_reviews.text: It did not have enough credit card slots. There no way to separate dollar bills from the coins. Really I was just appointed with this product. From now on, I will stick to going to the coach shop in person.
customer_reviews.author: Armeta

customer_reviews.title: Coin purse
customer_reviews.text: I just use this instead my purse to put coins in. It doesn’t come unzipped and it holds a bunch of lose change.
customer_reviews.author: Shavonne

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: I love this small wallet. You can just hang it on your wrist for travel or keep it in your purse!
customer_reviews.author: brandaleen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very nice for the price think it is a knock off but still nice
customer_reviews.author: lynn holloway

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I finally received the product after I purchased it a second time looks great
customer_reviews.author: Rapunzel

customer_reviews.title: I love this. It came with a gift box
customer_reviews.text: I love this. It came with a gift box. I use it for waitressing, it holds my bank, my cash and change. It's not bulky and fits perfectly in my apron.
customer_reviews.author: kristine banellis

customer_reviews.title: It’s Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect little wallet for my money and some cards! I don’t carry a lot of cards unless it important!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute wristlet
customer_reviews.text: Cute coach wristlet perfect for running into a store without having to carry a big bag!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: love this item
customer_reviews.text: i love this item. i use it for my glasses my airpods and my charger. perfect daily go to bag.
customer_reviews.author: katherine morejon

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: It's my daily pouch whwn I don't want a heavy pocketbook.
customer_reviews.author: Tee Dee

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: I love my wallet it was one the best things I bought from amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun size
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my wife, she loves it, great for those days she doesn’t want to carry a purse
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Early delivery
customer_reviews.text: It came early. It’s small and nice. The zipper looks cheap though.
customer_reviews.author: Fielon Wubishet

customer_reviews.title: durable
customer_reviews.text: The cover is not totally made of leather, but is very durable. In some degree, it is water proof.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Pan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Christmas gift for daughter-in-law.....she picked it out, so I'm sure she is enjoying it.
customer_reviews.author: SClay

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Item was in very good condition and I got a good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Was a gift for my daughter, she remarked as being “perfect” 👍
customer_reviews.author: Nellie

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I bought specifically to carry tampons each month. I love when my period rolls around and i get to carry my little Coach wristlet. Quality product. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer
